Topic.Title: How do i save a game

Posts.EditableText: How do I make it so people can save while playing my gamebook on Quest?
Posts.HTML: How do I make it so people can save while playing my gamebook on Quest?

Posts.EditableText: You don't have to do anything. They just can. Have you run into a case where people can't save?
Posts.HTML: You don't have to do anything. They just can. Have you run into a case where people can't save?
